review: Great product for 3.5 months then it fails to authenicate the wifi connection.  All other devices phones and computers work fine.  So you can't access Amazon instant video.  The fix is messing around with router security settings; no thank you.  Hooked up Roku and I can access Amazon instant video with no problem. Go figure!!!! Compared to other products like this the Firestick seems to be more sensitive to software settings and more prone to fatal errors.
